description: This file defines a class 'CacheCluster' that manages AWS ElastiCache cluster resources, including creation, reading, updating, deletion, and retrieval of endpoints and ports. It interacts with AWS via boto3 and uses custom logging and printing utilities.

classes.name: CacheCluster
classes.description: Represents an AWS ElastiCache cluster resource, providing methods to create, read, update, delete, and retrieve endpoint information.

methods.name: get_cache_cluster_id
methods.description: Returns the cache cluster ID, defaulting to the name if cache_cluster_id is None.

methods.name: get_auth_token
methods.description: Retrieves the authentication token, optionally reading from a secrets file if not set.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates the cache cluster in AWS using provided parameters.

methods.name: post_create
methods.description: Waits for the cache cluster to become available after creation.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads the current state of the cache cluster from AWS.

methods.name: _update
methods.description: Updates the cache cluster with new parameters.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the cache cluster from AWS.

methods.name: post_delete
methods.description: Waits for the cache cluster to be deleted.

methods.name: get_cache_endpoint
methods.description: Retrieves the network endpoint address of the cache cluster.

methods.name: get_cache_port
methods.description: Retrieves the network port of the cache cluster.
